TITLE: Categories
INVALID_CATEGORYID_PARAMETER: The value entered for the category identifier is invalid
INVALID_TEXT_PARAMETER: The category text must be informed and have a maximum of 100 characters
INVALID_INSERT_PARAMETER: The value entered for the function parameter is invalid
CATEGORY_TEXT_ALREADY_USED: There is already another category with this text
PARENT_CATEGORY_NOT_FOUND: The parent category entered was not found
INVALID_UPDATE_PARAMETER: The value entered for the function parameter is invalid
CATEGORY_NOT_FOUND: The category entered was not found
